definition: Kumul city in Xinjiang (Chinese: Hami)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
secret/confidential/close/thick/dense
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
Kumul prefecture in Xinjiang
Kumul city in Xinjiang (Chinese: Hami)

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大约只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: The Hamiltonian solution system is generalized to the Reissner-Mindlin thick plate problems.
sentences.chinese: 将哈密顿求解体系推广应用于薄板弯曲问题。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of measure synchronization is an important property in coupled Hamiltonian systems.
sentences.chinese: 测度同步现象是耦合哈密顿系统的一种重要性质。

sentences.english: Now, Hamilton College in Clinton, N.Y., says it will phase out merit scholarships altogether.
sentences.chinese: 纽约克林顿市的哈密尔顿学院说它将逐步淘汰奖学金。

sentences.english: The validity of homogeneous balance method for solving differential equation was shown by solving a new Hamilton amplitude equation.
sentences.chinese: 本文用齐次平衡方法求出了哈密顿振幅方程的精确解。

sentences.english: The solution uses eigen-solutions of nD Hamilton dual system.
sentences.chinese: 采用哈密顿型的本征解展开法求解之。

sentences.english: Next time when you have dinner in an Italian restaurant, order yourself prosciutto with cantaloupe to start the meal.
sentences.chinese: 下次去意大利餐厅时，点一份火腿哈密瓜开胃菜。

sentences.english: Why do the majority of customers choose to do Hetao Melon?
sentences.chinese: 为什么广大的客户会选择河套哈密瓜呢？

sentences.english: The algorithm can be used for balancing any system in which internetwork contains at least one Hamilton path.
sentences.chinese: 此算法适用于任何具有哈密顿通路的图结构网络。

sentences.english: In China, Xinjiang, there is a very well-known as a fruit, that is cantaloupe .
sentences.chinese: 在我国新疆，有一种非常出名的水果，那就是哈密瓜。

sentences.english: In chapter one, we give a brief introduction to the Hamiltonian method of integrable system.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章介绍可积系统的哈密顿方法。

sentences.english: We also have Hami melons and big apples here.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里还有哈密瓜和大苹果呢。

sentences.english: The author diagnosed and treated sheep Cp. pecorum that happened in abortion sheep.
sentences.chinese: 笔者对新疆哈密地区部分发生流产羊群进行了诊治。

sentences.english: This paper revises the homogeneous balance method and gets two exact solutions of Burgers KdV equation.
sentences.chinese: 本文用齐次平衡方法求出了哈密顿振幅方程的精确解。

sentences.english: Hami melon is rich areas, where higher temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 哈密是盛产哈密瓜的地方，这里气温较高。

sentences.english: Hami melon is rich areas, where higher temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 哈密是盛产哈密瓜的地方，这里气温较高。
